Container.Name: paperless-ngx
Container.Overview: Paperless-ngx(https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx) is an application by Daniel Quinn and contributors that indexes your scanned documents and allows you to easily search for documents and store metadata alongside your documents."
Container.Changes:
### 2022-05-19 - Revive.
### 2022-09-05 - Deprecate.
### 2022-05-16 - Add correct libqpdf.so to arm builds.
### 2022-05-14 - Fine tune disabling of redis.
### 2022-05-12 - Move migrations to after multilangocr mod. Fix disabling of redis. Add missing dep for postgresql.
### 2022-05-12 - Utilize lsio wheel for pikepdf.
### 2022-05-11 - Update upstream artifact name and utilize lsio wheels for scipy and scikit-learn.
### 2022-05-05 - Add runtime dependencies libxslt1.1 for armhf
### 2022-04-30 - Add runtime dependencies lizbar and poppler-utils
### 2022-04-27 - Add build-dependencies for arm32 builds.
### 2022-04-11 - Replaced uwsgi with gunicorn due to websocket issues.
### 2022-03-11 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: Path: /data
Config.Description: Storage location for all paperless-ngx data files.

Config.Name: REDIS_URL
Config.Description: Specify an external redis instance to use. Can optionally include a port (`redis:6379`) and/or db (`redis/foo`). If left blank or not included, will use a built-in redis instance. If changed after initial setup will also require manual modification of /config/settings.py

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: UMASK for newly created files. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
